snippet: A resident of the Narragansett Hotel on the Upper West Side was stabbed to death on July 27; the police say another tenant was responsible.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column on the once-stately Narragansett Hotel on the Upper West Side, now a single-room-occupancy building, the Narragansett is home to a diverse group of New Yorkers down on their luck; resident was stabbed to death in the building on July 27, and news that a fellow tenant has been arrested for the crime has thrown his neighbors into a panic.
lead_paragraph: A resident of the Narragansett Hotel on the Upper West Side was stabbed to death on July 27; the police say another tenant was responsible.

headline.seo: Killing Shakes the Narragansett Hotel in Manhattan
